caption: Relating to programs established and funded under the Texas emissions reduction plan.
summary: Cannot determine specific impacts to Chinese or other immigrants as this is only a fiscal note stating there are no significant financial implications to Texas from programs under the Texas emissions reduction plan. The actual bill text is needed to assess any potential impacts on immigrant communities.
translation: 这只是一份财政说明，表明德克萨斯州减排计划相关项目不会对州财政造成重大影响。由于缺少实际法案内容，无法评估对中国或其他移民群体的具体影响。
committees:
1. House Committee on Environmental Regulation
2. House Committee on Appropriations
3. House Committee on Energy Resources
category: Irrelevant - This fiscal note does not contain sufficient information to determine if the actual bill targets any specific nationalities or immigrants
